name: Entrance Hall
description: A large room with a portrait on the wall
long_description: You are standing in the entrance hall of a large cabin. There is a portrait on the wall which depicts a noble looking elderly man. The grim expression on his face spells trouble. There are doors to the north and east.

name: Sitting Room
description: A room with comfortable chairs around a fireplace
long_description: Comfortable-looking chairs rest facing a fireplace in this sitting room. A large window looks out onto the forest behind the cabin. There are doors to the south and east.

name: Kitchen
description: A room with a large stove and pots and pans
long_description: The center of this kitchen features a large wood-burning stove, pots and pans hang securely above it. Counter tops and cabinets line the walls, and a pantry can be seen to one side. There are doors to the west and north.

name: Dining Room
description: A room with a long table and chairs
long_description: A long oak table stretches across the middle of this dining room. sturdy-looking chairs line its sides with an larger ornate chair at the far head. There are doors to the south and west.
